mhs.src.storage.persistence

Class TaskLists

  • java.lang.Object
    • mhs.src.storage.persistence.TaskLists

  • public class TaskLists
extends java.lang.Object
    TaskLists Abstracts operations on the taskLists containing different views of tasks: 1. taskList - by taskId
    2. gCalTaskList - by gCalTaskId (Google Calendar)
    3. gTaskList - by gTaskId (Google Tasks)
    Functionality
    - logic for CRUD on tasks in all task lists
    - getters for taskLists
    Author:
    Timothy Lim Yi Wen A0087048X
